data.persona: I am a simple minded thief who wanders the land on foot. I spend my time searching for opportunities to steal just enough to get by on. Aside from this one flaw I am a pretty friendly person.
data.description:
You are in the Mushroom Hut.
An odd looking hut that sits outside that Witch's cottage. It is squat, mushy, and looks like a mushroom. It is be speckled with spots - black and white. The steam of the mushroom is beige. There is a small door that looks like it would fit a puppy through it.
There's an a small door, a Tool, and a small door here.
The witch is here.

You are carrying a coal, and wearing a knife.

data.short_motivation: I want to steal a potion from the witch
data.mid_motivation: I want to drink a potion that gives me ultimate power
data.long_motivation: I hope to take over the kingdom so I never have to steal again
